footer.topsub: Our team is ready to meet all your teak wood needs.
footer.logobottomtext: Taurus Ivoire meets your teak wood needs, from furniture to construction. Get the finest West African teak for any project.

AbouPage.p1: Taurus Ivoire is a leading exporter of sawn and dried teak wood based in the heart of Ivory Coast, West Africa. Established by passionate Ivoirean entrepreneurs, our company has grown from a local venture to a trusted name in the international timber industry.
AbouPage.p2: At Taurus Ivoire, we prioritize quality and sustainability. Our teak wood is harvested responsibly from managed forests, ensuring that each piece meets our stringent standards for durability and beauty. We work closely with local communities and forestry experts to promote ethical practices and environmental stewardship.
AbouPage.p3: Discover why Taurus Ivoire is the preferred choice for discerning customers who seek premium teak wood products backed by a commitment to excellence.

Servicepage.sub1: At Taurus Ivoire, our sawn and dried teak wood products are renowned for their premium quality and versatility. Perfect for a range of applications from fine furniture to robust construction, each piece exemplifies the excellence of West African teak.
Servicepage.sub2: Our teak wood products are perfect for numerous uses, including furniture making, flooring, decking, and more. Whether you're working on a residential or commercial project, we have the right materials for you.
Servicepage.sub3: Choose from our rough-sawn lumber for structural needs to finely finished boards for high-end furniture and cabinetry. Each product is designed to meet your specific project requirements.
Servicepage.sub4: With Taurus Ivoire, you can count on premium quality and reliability in every piece of teak wood. Browse our catalog to see how our products can bring your vision to life.
